book.name: fpt
book.title: Capture Pricing eOffer Training
book.body:
What is the New Capture Pricing Section?

Previously, you would enter pricing information using manual entry into a spreadsheet without a way to validate your information or check for errors.

Now, with the Capture Pricing section, you will have three options for entering pricing data that provide a streamlined process spanning both eOffer and eMod.

This new method offers a more intelligent pricing template that captures a more detailed picture of your pricing structure and provides feedback on the data you enter into the system, ultimately reducing errors in submission.

page.name: getting-started-tab-lesson
page.title: Getting Started Tab Lesson
page.body:
This is a lesson on filling out the Get Started tab. You must fill out this section before you can move onto the other tabs in the template. Click the play button to begin!

presentation/get_started_tab_lesson
Next Lesson

page.name: goods_services_lesson
page.title: Goods and Services Lesson
page.body:
This is a lesson on completing the Goods and Services section. GSA assigns all goods and services to Special Item Numbers (SINs). You must complete this section first before you can enter the rest of your pricing data.

Click the play button to begin!

presentation/goods_services_lesson
Next Lesson

page.name: wizard_management_lesson
page.title: Wizard Management Lesson
page.body:
This is a lesson on the Wizard Management section. This section will appear only when you choose Products Only or Products and Services within the offer category. You must fill out this section before you can enter any additional pricing information.

Click the play button to begin!

presentation/wizard_management_lesson
Next Lesson

page.name: zonal_pricing_lesson
page.title: Zonal Pricing Lesson
page.body:
This is a lesson on completing the first section of Zonal Pricing. If you selected Yes to this section in Wizard Management, you will see it added to the left-hand navigation menu, and later, as a tab in the On-Screen Data Entry template.

Click the play button to begin!

presentation/zonal_pricing_lesson
Next Lesson

page.name: special_charges_lesson
page.title: Special Charges Lesson
page.body:
This is a lesson on the Special Charges section. This is where you will indicate any special charges for delivery features like one or two day service, assembly, or installation, among others.

Click the play button to begin!

presentation/special_charges_lesson
Next Lesson

page.name: special_features_lesson
page.title: Special Features Lesson
page.body:
This is a lesson on the Special Features section. This section includes environmental features, Section 508 items, and other features that apply to the products under each SIN.

Click the play button to begin!

presentation/special_features_lesson
Next Lesson
